Finagle

Changing the world would be easier if I had the source code.

Safety Feature

Posted by code_monkey_steve, 2008-05-11 00:00:00 -0700

require 'mathn'
loop do
  puts "Enter an 11 digit prime number to continue:"
  n = $stdin.gets.chomp.to_i
  break  if n.to_s.size == 11  and
            n.prime_division.size == 1
end
